meanings.definition: The act of endorsing or supporting something.
meanings.sent1: Her indorsements of the new policy were crucial for its success.
meanings.sent2: The indorsements from the community leaders helped the charity event raise more funds.
meanings.sent3: The indorsements from the team members made the decision unanimous and final.
meanings.sent4: His indorsements of the project were like a stamp of approval, boosting morale.
meanings.sent5: The indorsements of the audience made the performance unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A signature on the back of a check or other document to transfer ownership.
meanings.sent1: Please remember to include your indorsements on the back of the check.
meanings.sent2: The indorsements on the legal documents were clear and legible.
meanings.sent3: His messy indorsements on the contract caused a delay in the transaction.
meanings.sent4: The indorsements on the deed symbolized the official transfer of property.
meanings.sent5: Her elegant indorsements on the artwork added a personal touch to the collection.
